text: DRSC responds quickly to my issue and solves them within the time frame needed. The pricing is also competitive and reasonable. I will continue to call them for help in future times of need. Thanks for your support.
Very terribel service and exteremely unprofessional! Dont send your devices to them, as they will only spoil it and say because your device is too old and die anytime!!
Really bad experience, very poor service and communication. It took me almost a year to recover all my data.
Excellent and swift service! Highly recommended for efficient diagnosis.
